Extensions/Collection.html#/s:s10Collect.abstract: Merges the incoming annotations with the existing list. Incoming annotations override those already there

Extensions/Collection.html.name: Collection
Extensions/Collection.html.abstract: An extension to collection that contain instances of annotations

Classes/STLRScope/GrammarRule.html#/s:4S.abstract: true if the rule is left hand recursive (the LHS is used in the RHS)

Classes/STLRScope/GrammarRule.html#/s:4S.abstract: true if the rule uses itself directly (rather than through an identifier in the rhs that eventually comes back to this rule)

Classes/STLRScope/Element.html#/s:4STLR9.name: quantifierAnnotations
Classes/STLRScope/Element.html#/s:4STLR9.abstract: Returns the annotations on the quantifier (rather than the element it is applied to)

Classes/STLRScope/Element.html#/s:4STLR9.name: elementAnnotations
Classes/STLRScope/Element.html#/s:4STLR9.abstract: The annotations on the lement itself (rather than the quantifier)

Classes/STLRScope/Element.html#/s:4STLR9.abstract: true if the Element can be represented using solely scanning rules. At the moment the only scanner rule is for one of multiple strings

Classes/STLRScope/Modifier.html#/s:4STLR.name: one
Classes/STLRScope/Modifier.html#/s:4STLR.abstract: Match just one

Classes/STLRScope/Modifier.html#/s:4STLR.name: zeroOrOne
Classes/STLRScope/Modifier.html#/s:4STLR.abstract: Match one or none

Classes/STLRScope/Modifier.html#/s:4STLR.name: zeroOrMore
Classes/STLRScope/Modifier.html#/s:4STLR.abstract: Match none or any number

Classes/STLRScope/Modifier.html#/s:4STLR.name: oneOrMore
Classes/STLRScope/Modifier.html#/s:4STLR.abstract: Match at least one up to any number

Classes/STLRScope/Modifier.html#/s:4STLR.name: not
Classes/STLRScope/Modifier.html#/s:4STLR.abstract: Invert the expression logical result

Classes/STLRScope/Modifier.html#/s:4STLR.name: void
Classes/STLRScope/Modifier.html#/s:4STLR.abstract: Do not generate a token, do not cause an extension to the range

Classes/STLRScope/Modifier.html#/s:4STLR.name: transient
Classes/STLRScope/Modifier.html#/s:4STLR.abstract: Do not generate a token, do cause an extension to the range

Classes/STLRScope/Modifier.html#/s:4STLR.name: isOne
Classes/STLRScope/Modifier.html#/s:4STLR.abstract: true if it’s an isOne case

Classes/STLRScope/Modifier.html#/s:4STLR.name: isZeroOrOne
Classes/STLRScope/Modifier.html#/s:4STLR.abstract: ‘true’ if it’s a zero or one case

Classes/STLRScope/Modifier.html#/s:4STLR.name: isZeroOrMore
Classes/STLRScope/Modifier.html#/s:4STLR.abstract: true if it’s a zero or more case

Classes/STLRScope/Modifier.html#/s:4STLR.name: isOneOrMore
Classes/STLRScope/Modifier.html#/s:4STLR.abstract: true if it’s a one or more case

Classes/STLRScope/Modifier.html#/s:4STLR.name: isNot
Classes/STLRScope/Modifier.html#/s:4STLR.abstract: true if it’s a not case

Classes/STLRScope/Modifier.html#/s:4STLR.name: isVoid
Classes/STLRScope/Modifier.html#/s:4STLR.abstract: true if it’s a consume case

Classes/STLRScope/Modifier.html#/s:4STLR.name: isTransient
Classes/STLRScope/Modifier.html#/s:4STLR.abstract: true if it’s the transient case

Classes/STLRScope/Modifier.html#/s:4STLR.abstract: A human readable description

Classes/STLRScope/Modifier.html#/s:4STLR.name: minimumMatches
Classes/STLRScope/Modifier.html#/s:4STLR.abstract: The smallest number of matches to satisfy the quantifier

Classes/STLRScope/Modifier.html#/s:4STLR.name: maximumMatches
Classes/STLRScope/Modifier.html#/s:4STLR.abstract: Returns the maximum number of allowed matches. A response of nil means there is

Classes/STLRScope/Modifier.html#/s:4STLR.name: unlimited
Classes/STLRScope/Modifier.html#/s:4STLR.abstract: Returns true if there is no ceiling to the number of matches

Classes/STLRScope/Modifier.html#/s:4STLR.name: transient
Classes/STLRScope/Modifier.html#/s:4STLR.abstract: Return true if absolutely no action should be taken on successful match (but a match must still occur)

Classes/STLRScope/Modifier.html#/s:4STLR.name: void
Classes/STLRScope/Modifier.html#/s:4STLR.abstract: Return true if absolutely no action should be taken on successful match (but a match must still occur)

Classes/STLRScope/Modifier.html#/s:4STLR.abstract: Creates a rule wrappng the supplied rule and appying the specified modifier

Classes/STLRScope/Expression.html#/s:4ST.abstract: An expression which has a single element
